name: habitsync
tagline: A self-hosted habit tracker that synchronizes routines and progress
description: HabitSync is a self-hosted habit tracker that syncs daily routines and progress between devices. It supports streaks, charts, and reminders designed with a focus on privacy and data control.

features.title: Habit Data Synchronization
features.description: Synchronizes habit and task data between different habit tracking systems

features.title: Habitica Integration
features.description: Connects directly to Habitica accounts to read and update habit data

features.title: Bidirectional Sync
features.description: Propagates changes in both directions between connected services

features.title: Conflict Handling
features.description: Detects conflicting updates and applies defined resolution rules

features.title: Command-Line Operation
features.description: Runs synchronization tasks from a command-line interface

features.title: Configuration Files
features.description: Defines sync behavior and credentials using configuration files

features.title: Local Execution
features.description: Run synchronization on your own machine or servers
